name: FarTD
description:
IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED THAT YOU DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS STAND ALONE VERSION IF YOU ARE HAVING ISSUES WITH LAG ON THE WebGL VERSION.

A Tower Defence and Factory Building game, in which the player is crash-landed on an alien planet and is struggling to protect their ship (core) from oncoming waves of alien attackers, so that they achieve the highest wave score possible.

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Move
  • LShift - Sprint
  • LCtrl - Crouch
  • LMB - Gun Mode Interact (Shoot, Mine, Build or Destroy)
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 - Switch Gun Mode (Shooting, Mining, Building, Destroying)
  • Q - Open Inventory
  • E - Interact with some buildings
